definition:
1. To prepare by beating or working, as leather or hemp; to taw. 2. Hence, to beat; to scourge; also, to pull about; to maul; to tease; to vex. [Obs. or Prov. Eng. & Scot.]

To work hard; to strive; to fuse. [Local]

To tow along, as a vessel. [Obs.] Drayton.

A rope or chain for towing a boat; also, a cord; a string. [Obs. or Prov. Eng.]
